CustomField.description: Optional. The name of a custom Apex class that implements the IPostActionHook interface. This hook runs immediately after the main action completes, receiving the action's result. Ideal for "fire and forget" tasks like logging or auditing.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional: The name of an Apex class that implements IPostActionHook to run custom logic after this action executes.
CustomField.label: Post-Execution Hook
